DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether combination deep transcranial magnetic stimulation ( DTMS ) treatment customary medication obsessive compulsive disorder ( OCD ) patient effective treatment include medication .
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability , Safety Efficacy HAC-Coil Deep Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Medication Resistance Obsessive Compulsive Disorder ( OCD ) Subjects
